---
title: "Gallery of R Syntax Highlighting"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE,
                      results='show', cache=FALSE, autodep=FALSE, error = TRUE)
```

Here's a sample of various R syntax highlighting.


These are the tags, sort by highlighter and theme.

body {
